result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sara Jan Croft

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on December 9, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Calendar call on October 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on October 13, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

State appears by ADA Kerri Puig. Deft appears. Atty Michael Hughes appears. Parties discuss cases. State to prepare global offer.
Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference on September 28, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 9:00 am 
INCLUDES 21CF1054, 21CM1124, 22CF363, 22CF924, 22CF936, & 22CM277. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft appears by Zoom Video with Atty Michael Hughes. 

BFH IN 21CF1054, 21CM1124, 22CF363, & 22CM277. 
Atty Hughes makes statement. 
State does not request bond forfeitures. 
COURT vacates bond forfeiture. 

Atty Hughes requests appointment on 22CF924 & 22CF936. 
COURT appoints Atty Hughes on those matters. 
Atty Hughes requests lower payment for reimbursement. 
COURT directs that matter be addressed with COC Office. 
PTC set for 9/28/2022 at 10:30 am on all files. 
Adj: 9:03 am 

cc: Payment Officer

Clerk: Amanda. 
Case called at 9:32 am.
INCLUDES: 22CF924 and 22CF936. 

Date & Time set for IH; 

Defendant is directed to contact SPD to get clarification on representation. 

Hearing may need to be rescheduled. 
Adj: 9:34 am.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: INCLUDES 22CF924 & 22CF936: Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (3) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk Micki. 
Case called: 2:49 p.m.
INCLUDES 22CF924 and 22CF936

State appears by ADA Ben Vechinski for ADA Kerri Puig.  Defendant appears in custody from the MCJ with Attorney Peter Vu.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Prelim Time Limits Waived.
PLEA:  NOT GUILTY on misds.

COURT ORDERS: $2,000.00 signature bond on both files. 

CONDITIONS: 
- No driving without valid DL. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 3 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

Dates:
IH - 8/8/22 at 9:30 a.m. Br. 5
BFH/SC - 8/19/22 at 9:00 a.m.

Branch 3.

ADJ: 2:52 p.m.
